Package com.estg.pickingManagement

Interface Route

  • public interface Route
    Contract representing a route for item picking

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAidBox​(AidBox aidBox)
      Adds a new Aid Box to the route
      boolean containsAidBox​(AidBox aidBox)
      Checks if the route contains an Aid Box
      Report getReport()
      Getter for route report
      AidBox[] getRoute()
      Getter for a deep copy of the route
      double getTotalDistance()  
      double getTotalDuration()  
      Vehicle getVehicle()
      Getter for the vehicle of the route

      Inserts an Aid Box before another Aid Box in the route

      Removes an Aid Box from the route

      Replaces an Aid Box from the route

    • Method Detail

      • addAidBox

        void addAidBox​(AidBox aidBox)
        throws RouteException
        Adds a new Aid Box to the route
        Parameters:
        aidBox - the Aid Box to add
        Throws:
        RouteException - if the Aid Box cannot be added to the route:
        1. if the Aid Box is null
        2. if the Aid Box is already in the route
        3. if the Aid Box is not compatible (doesn't have a container that can be picked by the vehicle) with the Vehicle of the route

      • removeAidBox

        AidBox removeAidBox​(AidBox aidBox)
             throws RouteException
        Removes an Aid Box from the route
        Parameters:
        aidBox - the Aid Box to remove
        Returns:
        the removed Aid Box
        Throws:
        RouteException - if the Aid Box parameter is null or if the Aid Box is not in the route

      • containsAidBox

        boolean containsAidBox​(AidBox aidBox)
        Checks if the route contains an Aid Box
        Parameters:
        aidBox - the Aid Box to check
        Returns:
        true if the route contains the Aid Box, false otherwise

      • replaceAidBox

        void replaceAidBox​(AidBox from,
                   AidBox to)
            throws RouteException
        Replaces an Aid Box from the route
        Parameters:
        from - the Aid Box to replace
        to - the Aid Box to replace with
        Throws:
        RouteException - if the Aid Box cannot be added to the route:
        1. if any Aid Box is null
        2. if the Aid Box to replace is not in the route
        3. if the Aid Box to insert is already in the route
        4. if the Aid Box to insert is not compatible (doesn't have a container that can be picked by the vehicle) with the Vehicle of the route

      • insertAfter

        void insertAfter​(AidBox after,
                 AidBox toInsert)
          throws RouteException
        Inserts an Aid Box before another Aid Box in the route
        Parameters:
        after - the Aid Box to insert before
        toInsert - the Aid Box to insert
        Throws:
        RouteException - if the Aid Box cannot be added to the route:
        1. if any Aid Box is null
        2. if the Aid Box to replace is not in the route
        3. if the Aid Box to insert is already in the route
        4. if the Aid Box to insert is not compatible (doesn't have a container that can be picked by the vehicle) with the Vehicle of the route

      • getRoute

        AidBox[] getRoute()
        Getter for a deep copy of the route
        Returns:
        the route

      • getVehicle

        Vehicle getVehicle()
        Getter for the vehicle of the route
        Returns:
        the vehicle of the route

      • getTotalDistance

        double getTotalDistance()

      • getTotalDuration

        double getTotalDuration()

      • getReport

        Report getReport()
        Getter for route report
        Returns:
        the generated route report
